meanings.definition: A system of training a new generation of practitioners of a trade or profession with on-the-job training and often some accompanying study (as in a trade school or college)
meanings.sent1: Many young people learn valuable skills through apprenticeships.
meanings.sent2: Apprenticeships provide hands-on experience in addition to classroom learning.
meanings.sent3: The apprenticeships were so popular that even the older workers wanted to join in.
meanings.sent4: Embarking on apprenticeships is like diving into a pool of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The success of the apprenticeships program spread like wildfire.

meanings.sent1: She was excited to start her apprenticeship at the bakery.
meanings.sent2: The apprenticeships were highly sought after by many aspiring professionals.
meanings.sent3: His apprenticeship was like a stepping stone towards his dream career.
meanings.sent4: In the world of apprenticeships, dedication is key to success.
meanings.sent5: The apprenticeship offered a glimpse into the world of culinary arts.

meanings.definition: The period of time when a person is an apprentice
meanings.sent1: During his apprenticeship, he learned the ropes of the trade.
meanings.sent2: Apprenticeships typically last for a few years.
meanings.sent3: The apprenticeship flew by in a whirlwind of learning and growth.
meanings.sent4: She cherished every moment of her apprenticeship, knowing it would shape her future.
meanings.sent5: The apprenticeship period was a transformative journey for many.
